articles.title: Nine Out Of 10 Individual F&O Traders Lost Money In FY22 - BQ Prime
articles.description: 89% individual traders suffered an average loss of Rs 1.1 lakh in FY22. In comparison, 11% made a profit of Rs 1.5 lakh.
articles.content: You may have heard it. The regulator has found it to be true. Trading in F&O is largely a losing game. Nine out of 10 individual traders in the futures and option market ended up losing money in … [+526 chars]
